text.autoconfig.sponger.title: Sponger Config
text.autoconfig.sponger.option.enableInO: If disabled, sponges won't absorb water in the Overworld
text.autoconfig.sponger.option.enableInN: If disabled, wet sponges won't dry in the Nether
text.autoconfig.sponger.option.spongeRad: The radius in which sponges absorb water
